text: The Azerbaijan national basketball team () is the national basketball team of Azerbaijan. The team is controlled by the Azerbaijan Basketball Federation. Azerbaijan has been a FIBA member since 1991, although they have not fielded a senior national team in any competition in over five years. ==Current roster== At the 2013 EuroBasket Qualification:Azerbaijan | 2013 EuroBasket Qualification, ARCHIVE.FIBA.COM. Retrieved 26 October 2016.
